column5: Took a Loooonnnggg Walk along a favorite haunt today....Waaaaayyyy up river,..and saw a dozen or so nookies and maybe a few from the first run of the season,..another inch of rain and it's game on..!!!!         Bring On the RAIN!!!

Yes the same here in the eastern tribs,there have been a few fish poking around,they are not way up yet, but soon.....i agree BRING ON THE RAIN..  ..we need it for all kinds of things as well,for other species too...thanks for the update on those salmon...cheers
